services.footer: All of this made with love to pamper your pet

first.title: Bath
first.description:
We bathe all dogs with Ozone, at no additional cost. Ozone helps eliminate odors, takes care of the fur and skin, relieves allergies, and activates circulation.
We use the best products for the care and hygiene of your pet, adapting the best treatment according to their particular needs.
All baths include nail trimming, ear cleaning, and anal gland cleaning.

second.title: Commercial Cut
second.description:
Most canine breeds have a standard cut. We always work with the appropriate technique for each coat and adapt to the preferences of our clients.
The service of bathing and cutting hair for dogs consists of a bath and machine cut, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and anal gland cleaning.

third.title: Scissor Cut
third.description: The service of bathing and hair cutting for dogs consists of a bath and combing, scissor cut, nail trimming, ear cleaning, and anal gland cleaning.

fourth.title: Stripping
fourth.description: Stripping is an essential care technique for dogs with hard hair and is of great importance for coat maintenance. Dogs with hard hair, such as terriers and schnauzers, have hair that continues to grow and can become rough and unkempt without proper maintenance. Stripping helps remove dead hair and maintain a healthy and well-kept coat.

fifth.title: Bath and Grooming
fifth.description: The service of bathing and grooming consists of a bath and maintenance of the dog's cut, with combing, ear cleaning, and anal gland cleaning.

sixth.title: Ozone Therapy
sixth.description: Ozone bathing aids skin recovery. At the same time, it enhances the absorption of nutrients from cosmetic products used to improve the animal's coat. Ozone therapy sessions and the way ozone is administered vary depending on the needs of your pet.

company.semantic_label: Text logo of Mimos dog grooming
company.description:
At Mimos Dog Grooming, we understand that pets are part of your family. Our commitment is to provide them with exceptional care and make them feel comfortable and calm throughout their visit. We know that the importance of dog grooming is not just aesthetic; those who love their pets also seek the best for their health.
Our goal is to apply to each dog a service adapted to their particular needs, so we always work with the appropriate technique for each coat.
Schedule an appointment or contact us if you have any questions or concerns. At Mimos Dog Grooming, we believe that every dog deserves to be pampered and cared for in the best possible way. We're waiting for you!

owner.title: Ana Julia
owner.description:
Hello! I'm Ana, the mind and hands behind the beauty and well-being of our beloved furry friends at Mimos Dog Grooming. I have always had a love for animals, and today I am thrilled to live the dream of having my own grooming salon where I can continue to evolve in my career. The safety and well-being of your pets are my top priorities; I not only want them to look beautiful but also to feel pampered and attended to.
Feel free to contact me to schedule an appointment or for any questions you may have. Hope to see you soon!
Thank you for trusting me with the care of your pets.
